mapper.sql: select t.rec_id, t.question_id, q.q_name, t.group_name, t.group_sort, t.rec_status, t.rec_person, t.rec_time, t.rec_updateperson, t.rec_updatetime, u.nick_name as user_name from d_question_title_group t left join sys_user u on t.rec_person=u.user_name left join d_question_bank q on t.question_id=q.rec_id
